sub_title_1: අදම හොඳම අනුපාතය සහ අඩුම ගාස්තු සමඟ මුදල් යැවීම ආරම්භ කරන්න!

covid.secondary: Important information regarding our business hours and steps we are taking to protect the health of our customers and employees.

refer.secondary: With our Referral program, there are no limits on how much you can earn! Receive $50 for every 3 people who make their first transfer.

mobile_apps.secondary: Created for our customers on the go, Remitbee available for all IOS and Android devices!

fee_free.secondary: Send over 500 CAD via the Remitbee Wallet option for fee-free transfers! Our fees are always as low as possible and are never hidden.
